results.name: Hadamard maximal determinant problem: largest determinant of (+1,-1)-matrix of order n.
reference: Ed Hughes and Rob Pratt, New Features in SAS/OR 13.1, SAS Paper SAS256-2014.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
See A003432 for further references, links and formulas.
link: Richard P. Brent and Judy-anne H. Osborn, On minors of maximal determinant matrices, arXiv preprint arXiv:1208.3819 [math.CO], 2012.
Massimiliano Fasi, Gian Maria Negri Porzio, Determinants of Normalized Bohemian Upper Hessemberg Matrices, University of Manchester (England, 2019).
Ion Nechita, Some analytical aspects of Hadamard matrices.
W. P. Orrick and B. Solomon, Large-determinant sign matrices of order 4k+1, Discr. Math. 307 (2007), 226-236.

Index entries for sequences related to maximal determinants
xref: A003432 is the main entry for this sequence.
Cf. A188895 (number of distinct matrices having this maximal determinant).
